Negotiations using CMA/PA approaches in new issue areas include attempts to liberalize trade in environmental goods and additional liberalization in services under a proposed TiSA (Trade in Services Agreement). Negotiations outside of the WTO among a small subset of mostly high-income countries have taken place for additional intellectual property rights protection and resulted in the anti-counterfeiting agreement (ACTA).
